conversations.content: Add a copyright notice to the top of all my JavaScript files in the src directory.
I need to update the version number in package.json to 2.1.0 and also add a new changelog entry.

tool_call: contentManager_batchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732151200000_i5j6k7l8m", "workspaceId": "ws_1732151200000_n9o0p1q2r", "sessionDescription": "Batch updating version files", "sessionMemory": "User releasing version 2.1.0 with changelog", "toolContext": "Multiple content operations", "primaryGoal": "Update version and changelog", "subgoal": "Batch content edits"}, "operations": [{"type": "replace", "path": "package.json", "pattern": ""version": "2.0.0"", "replacement": ""version": "2.1.0""}, {"type": "prepend", "path": "CHANGELOG.md", "content": "## v2.1.0 - 2025-11-20

### Added
- New feature X
- Performance improvements

### Fixed
- Bug fix Y

"}]}
Create a folder structure for my 2025 quarterly reports.

tool_call: vaultManager_createFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731525600000_a1b2c3d4e", "workspaceId": "ws_1731525600000_f5g6h7i8j", "sessionDescription": "Setting up quarterly reporting structure", "sessionMemory": "User organizing annual reports", "toolContext": "Creating folder for Q1 reports", "primaryGoal": "Organize 2025 reports", "subgoal": "Create Q1 folder"}, "path": "Reports/2025/Q1"}
Delete the test-data folder and all its contents.

tool_call: vaultManager_deleteFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731526800000_u1v2w3x4y", "workspaceId": "ws_1731526800000_z5a6b7c8d", "sessionDescription": "Removing test data", "sessionMemory": "Tests complete, cleanup phase", "toolContext": "Deleting test data folder recursively", "primaryGoal": "Clean test environment", "subgoal": "Remove test data"}, "path": "dev/test-data", "recursive": true}
Delete my scratch notes file.

tool_call: vaultManager_deleteNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731528600000_y1z2a3b4c", "workspaceId": "ws_1731528600000_d5e6f7g8h", "sessionDescription": "Cleaning temporary files", "sessionMemory": "Extracted needed info from scratch", "toolContext": "Removing temporary scratch file", "primaryGoal": "Clean workspace", "subgoal": "Delete scratch notes"}, "path": "Temp/scratch.md"}
List all files and folders in my Documentation directory with full depth.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731531000000_m1n2o3p4q", "workspaceId": "ws_1731531000000_r5s6t7u8v", "sessionDescription": "Auditing documentation", "sessionMemory": "Documentation review process", "toolContext": "Getting complete directory tree", "primaryGoal": "Audit documentation", "subgoal": "List all contents"}, "path": "Documentation", "includeFiles": true, "includeFolders": true, "depth": 5}
Search for notes about GraphQL schema design.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731532800000_q1r2s3t4u", "workspaceId": "ws_1731532800000_v5w6x7y8z", "sessionDescription": "GraphQL schema research", "sessionMemory": "Designing API schema", "toolContext": "Searching GraphQL documentation", "primaryGoal": "Design GraphQL API", "subgoal": "Research schema patterns"}, "query": "GraphQL schema types resolvers", "limit": 15, "includeContent": true}
Search for information about REST API best practices.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731534000000_k1l2m3n4o", "workspaceId": "ws_1731534000000_p5q6r7s8t", "sessionDescription": "REST API research", "sessionMemory": "Building new API", "toolContext": "Searching API best practices", "primaryGoal": "Design REST API", "subgoal": "Research best practices"}, "query": "REST API best practices endpoints versioning", "limit": 12, "includeContent": false}
Find markdown files in my docs folder only.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731535800000_o1p2q3r4s", "workspaceId": "ws_1731535800000_t5u6v7w8x", "sessionDescription": "Locating documentation", "sessionMemory": "Documentation audit", "toolContext": "Finding markdown docs", "primaryGoal": "Audit docs", "subgoal": "List markdown files"}, "query": "*.md", "paths": ["docs"], "searchType": "files", "fileTypes": [".md"], "limit": 50}
Create an agent to help with technical writing.

tool_call: agentManager_createAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731537600000_s1t2u3v4w", "workspaceId": "ws_1731537600000_x5y6z7a8b", "sessionDescription": "Setting up writing assistant", "sessionMemory": "Creating specialized agents", "toolContext": "Creating technical writing agent", "primaryGoal": "Improve documentation", "subgoal": "Create agent"}, "name": "Technical Writer", "description": "Assists with clear, concise technical documentation", "prompt": "You are a technical writing expert. Help create clear, accurate, and user-friendly documentation.", "isEnabled": true}
Switch to my coding workspace.

tool_call: memoryManager_loadWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731550200000_u1v2w3x4y", "workspaceId": "ws_1731550200000_z5a6b7c8d", "sessionDescription": "Switching to coding", "sessionMemory": "Starting development session", "toolContext": "Loading coding workspace", "primaryGoal": "Start coding", "subgoal": "Load workspace"}, "id": "ws_1731400000000_code456", "limit": 5}
Add urgent tag to my current state.

tool_call: memoryManager_updateState
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731555600000_g1h2i3j4k", "workspaceId": "ws_1731555600000_l5m6n7o8p", "sessionDescription": "Tagging state", "sessionMemory": "Marking critical checkpoint", "toolContext": "Adding state tags", "primaryGoal": "Organize states", "subgoal": "Tag state"}, "stateId": "state_1731555000000_current123", "addTags": ["urgent", "production-ready"]}
List all files in my Books directory.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731557400000_u1v2w3x4y", "workspaceId": "ws_1731557400000_z5a6b7c8d", "sessionDescription": "Reviewing book collection", "sessionMemory": "Cataloging reading list", "toolContext": "Listing book files", "primaryGoal": "Review books", "subgoal": "List directory"}, "path": "Books", "includeFiles": true, "includeFolders": false}
Relocate my 2024 Projects folder to Archive.

tool_call: vaultManager_moveFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731558600000_o1p2q3r4s", "workspaceId": "ws_1731558600000_t5u6v7w8x", "sessionDescription": "Archiving old projects", "sessionMemory": "Year-end cleanup", "toolContext": "Moving 2024 projects to archive", "primaryGoal": "Archive 2024 work", "subgoal": "Move projects folder"}, "path": "Projects/2024", "newPath": "Archive/2024"}
Show me folders and files in my Media directory, 2 levels deep.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731561600000_m1n2o3p4q", "workspaceId": "ws_1731561600000_r5s6t7u8v", "sessionDescription": "Reviewing media structure", "sessionMemory": "Organizing media files", "toolContext": "Listing media with depth", "primaryGoal": "Review media", "subgoal": "List with depth"}, "path": "Media", "includeFiles": true, "includeFolders": true, "depth": 2}
Find all CSS files in my styles folder.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731562800000_g1h2i3j4k", "workspaceId": "ws_1731562800000_l5m6n7o8p", "sessionDescription": "Locating stylesheets", "sessionMemory": "Refactoring CSS", "toolContext": "Finding CSS files", "primaryGoal": "Refactor styles", "subgoal": "Locate CSS"}, "query": "*.css", "paths": ["styles"], "searchType": "files", "fileTypes": [".css"], "limit": 30}
Search for Kubernetes deployment notes.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731564600000_k1l2m3n4o", "workspaceId": "ws_1731564600000_p5q6r7s8t", "sessionDescription": "K8s research", "sessionMemory": "Learning container orchestration", "toolContext": "Searching Kubernetes docs", "primaryGoal": "Learn Kubernetes", "subgoal": "Search deployment notes"}, "query": "Kubernetes deployment pods services", "limit": 18, "includeContent": true}
Search for WebSocket implementation notes.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731565800000_e1f2g3h4i", "workspaceId": "ws_1731565800000_j5k6l7m8n", "sessionDescription": "WebSocket research", "sessionMemory": "Adding real-time features", "toolContext": "Searching WebSocket docs", "primaryGoal": "Implement WebSockets", "subgoal": "Research approach"}, "query": "WebSocket real-time connection socket.io", "limit": 10, "includeContent": false}
Show only folders in Projects, no files.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731591600000_q1r2s3t4u", "workspaceId": "ws_1731591600000_v5w6x7y8z", "sessionDescription": "Reviewing project folders", "sessionMemory": "Organizing project structure", "toolContext": "Listing folders only", "primaryGoal": "Review structure", "subgoal": "List folders"}, "path": "Projects", "includeFiles": false, "includeFolders": true}
Delete the old backup folder from last year.

tool_call: vaultManager_deleteFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731604200000_c4d5e6f7g", "workspaceId": "ws_1731604200000_h8i9j0k1l", "sessionDescription": "Deleting old backup", "sessionMemory": "Cleaning up old files", "toolContext": "Removing outdated backup", "primaryGoal": "Free up space", "subgoal": "Delete backup folder"}, "path": "/backups/2023"}
List all available AI models I can use with my agents.

tool_call: agentManager_listModels
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731604700000_h9i0j1k2l", "workspaceId": "ws_1731604700000_m3n4o5p6q", "sessionDescription": "Listing available models", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "Checking model options", "primaryGoal": "See available models", "subgoal": "List all models"}, "provider": "all"}
Show me all workspaces I've created.

tool_call: memoryManager_listWorkspaces
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731605000000_k2l3m4n5o", "workspaceId": "ws_1731605000000_p6q7r8s9t", "sessionDescription": "Listing all workspaces", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "Viewing workspace list", "primaryGoal": "See all workspaces", "subgoal": "List workspaces"}}
Search my research folder for files mentioning machine learning algorithms.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731606200000_w4x5y6z7a", "workspaceId": "ws_1731606200000_b8c9d0e1f", "sessionDescription": "ML algorithm search", "sessionMemory": "Researching algorithms", "toolContext": "Finding ML content", "primaryGoal": "Locate ML resources", "subgoal": "Search research folder"}, "query": "machine learning algorithm", "folder": "/research", "fileTypes": [".md", ".txt", ".pdf"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}
Update my current session description to reflect that we're now working on the frontend.

tool_call: memoryManager_updateSession
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731606500000_z7a8b9c0d", "workspaceId": "ws_1731606500000_e1f2g3h4i", "sessionDescription": "Updating session context", "sessionMemory": "Switched from backend to frontend work", "toolContext": "Changing session description", "primaryGoal": "Update context", "subgoal": "Modify session description"}, "sessionId": "session_1731606500000_z7a8b9c0d", "updates": {"description": "Frontend development - React components and styling"}}
Show me what's in my downloads directory.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731606900000_d1e2f3g4h", "workspaceId": "ws_1731606900000_i5j6k7l8m", "sessionDescription": "Viewing downloads", "sessionMemory": "Checking downloaded files", "toolContext": "Listing directory contents", "primaryGoal": "See downloads", "subgoal": "List directory"}, "path": "/downloads", "recursive": false}
Move my old notes folder to the archive.

tool_call: vaultManager_moveFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731607600000_k8l9m0n1o", "workspaceId": "ws_1731607600000_p2q3r4s5t", "sessionDescription": "Archiving old notes", "sessionMemory": "Organizing vault", "toolContext": "Moving folder to archive", "primaryGoal": "Clean up vault", "subgoal": "Move notes folder"}, "path": "/notes/2023", "newPath": "/archive/notes-2023"}
Search all my JavaScript files for console.log statements that should be removed before production.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731607900000_n1o2p3q4r", "workspaceId": "ws_1731607900000_s5t6u7v8w", "sessionDescription": "Finding console logs", "sessionMemory": "Preparing for production", "toolContext": "Searching for debug code", "primaryGoal": "Clean up code", "subgoal": "Find console.log"}, "query": "console\\.log", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".js", ".jsx", ".ts", ".tsx"], "caseSensitive": true, "wholeWord": false}
Execute a prompt to analyze my codebase for potential security vulnerabilities.

tool_call: agentManager_executePrompt
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731608200000_q4r5s6t7u", "workspaceId": "ws_1731608200000_v8w9x0y1z", "sessionDescription": "Security analysis", "sessionMemory": "Running security audit", "toolContext": "Analyzing for vulnerabilities", "primaryGoal": "Improve security", "subgoal": "Run security scan"}, "prompt": "Analyze the following code files for common security vulnerabilities including SQL injection, XSS, CSRF, insecure authentication, and data exposure. Provide specific findings and recommendations.", "filepaths": ["/src/auth/login.ts", "/src/api/users.ts", "/src/database/queries.ts"], "model": "claude-sonnet-4", "provider": "anthropic"}
Update my code review agent to use a more detailed system prompt.

tool_call: agentManager_updateAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731609200000_a4b5c6d7e", "workspaceId": "ws_1731609200000_f8g9h0i1j", "sessionDescription": "Updating agent prompt", "sessionMemory": "Improving code reviews", "toolContext": "Modifying agent config", "primaryGoal": "Better code reviews", "subgoal": "Update prompt"}, "id": "agent_code_reviewer", "updates": {"systemPrompt": "You are an expert code reviewer with deep knowledge of software engineering best practices. When reviewing code, check for: 1) Logic errors and bugs, 2) Security vulnerabilities, 3) Performance issues, 4) Code maintainability and readability, 5) Adherence to SOLID principles, 6) Proper error handling, 7) Test coverage. Provide specific, actionable feedback with code examples."}}
Show me the contents of my assets directory.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731609800000_g0h1i2j3k", "workspaceId": "ws_1731609800000_l4m5n6o7p", "sessionDescription": "Viewing assets", "sessionMemory": "Checking project assets", "toolContext": "Listing directory", "primaryGoal": "See available assets", "subgoal": "List directory"}, "path": "/assets", "recursive": true}
